Kwanan wuri na cutar coronavirus (COVID-19) ya nuna ayyuka masu yawa a kasashen European Union/European Economic Area da kuma Birtaniya wanda ya tabbatar cewa, yayin da a cikin ƙasashen da suka yi nasara, COVID-19 ya ci gaba da ci gaba a duk ƙasashen.

A ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019, kungiyar cutar jini da ainihin ainihi ba a san ba ta bayyana a Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 9 ga watan Janairu 2020, China Center for Disease Control and Prevention ya bayyana jani na cutar a matsayin cutar coronavirus na musamman wanda aka fi sani da severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
Saboda, cutar da ke haifarwa daga cutar SARS-CoV-2 ta kasance an yi masa suna cutar coronavirus (COVID-19).
Bayanan da ake gani har yanzu shine cewa kusan 80% na mutanen da cutar COVID-19 ke da cutar mala'ijanci, i.e. cutar kwayar cuta ta hanyar hankali ko baya, da kuma akwai yawan su dawowa.

Mace-mace na masu lafiya da aka ajiye saboda COVID-19 shine ca 4%.

A cikin wannan bincike, muna ayyana tattarfe-tattarfe a cikin jihar Hubei ta kasar Sin da kuma kasashen da ke cikin European Union/European Economic Area (EU/EEA) da United Kingdom (UK) da kuma suka yi kama da wannan na Hubei Province, China.
Kuma muna kawo karshen adadin COVID-19 a kasashe na EU/EEA da Birtaniya da kuma a Italiya a ranar 31 ga watan Janairu zuwa 15 ga watan Maris 2020.
Cutar COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da UK
Bayan kasar Sin, COVID-19 ya ci gaba da yaduwa a fadin duniya kuma yanayin cutar COVID-19 a cikin ƙasashen duniya na yanzu yana daidaita da wannan ƙasa.
A ranar 11 ga watan Maris 2020, Shugaban Kasa na Majalisar Dinkin Duniya (WHO) ya tabbatar da cewa COVID-19 ya zama cutar da ta duniya.
A cikin taron Eurosurveillance na 5 ga watan Maris na shekara ta 2020, Spiteri da sauransu sun bayyana a cikin taron na farko na COVID-19 a cikin Turai kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin bayanan WHO.
A cikin EU/EEA, an bayyana na farko na biyu na tabbatarwa ne da aka bayyana da Faransa a ranar 24 ga watan Janairu 2020 a cikin mutane da ke tsira daga Wuhan, Hubei Province, China.

A ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020, cututtukan COVID-19 an tabbatar da cewa a duk 30 kasashen EU/EEA da kuma Burtaniya (UK), inda tsakanin ranar 31 ga Disamba 2019 da wannan ranar, an tabbatar da cewa 39,768 cututtuka da kuma 1,727 mutuwa an tabbatar da cewa, tare da 17,750 cututtuka da kuma 1,441 mutuwa daga Italiya kawai.
Samun adadin juna da adadin juna na COVID-19

A cikin European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC), adireshin COVID-19 da aka bayyana a kowace ƙasa a duniya, da aka samu daga kawai sassan hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ƙasashen da suka hada da Hukumar Lafiya ta Ƙasashen Duniya, hukumomin kiwon lafiya na ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin ƙasa da ƙungiyoyin
An yi amfani da wannan bayanin don yin bayyana kan haɗari na COVID-19 a cikin EU/EEA da Birtaniya, da kuma yin bayyana kan haɗari na Italiya.

A matsayin wakilci na yawan cutar COVID-19, muka yi imanin da 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases, don haka muka yarda da matsayin COVID-19, a kowace ƙasa ta EU/EEA da UK, a cikin lokacin 1 Janairu–15 Maris 2020.
Kuma muka gabatar da adadin kowane ƙasa da aka tabbatar da shi a ranar 15 ga watan Maris 2020 8:00 a.m. da kuma shi da Italiya a cikin lokacin 31 ga watan Janairu–15 ga watan Maris 2020.
Trend na COVID-19 a kasashen EU/EEA da UK
Trendin da ke cikin 14-day truncated cumulative incidence of COVID-19 cases a cikin kasashen EU/EEA da kuma Birtaniya ya yi kama da na Hubei Province (China) (Figure 1).

Masu cutar SARS-CoV-2 na iya haɗawa da jama'a daga kowane shekaru, amma kawai a shekaru 30-65.

Kusan kashi 47.7% na mutanen da suka kamu da cutar suna da shekaru 50 ko sama da haka, da yawa suna da shekaru 20 ko sama da haka, da kuma kashi 14 na mutanen da suka kamu da cutar suna da shekaru 10 ko sama da haka.

Rashin daidaituwa (R0) na ƙarshe ya kasance 3.77 (95% CI: 3.51-4.05), kuma R0 na ƙarshe ya kasance 2.23-4.82.
Yawan mutanen da suka kamu da cutar ya karu da tsawon lokaci kafin 23 Janairu 2020, ya danganci lokacin da aka yi amfani da jiragen sama kafin bikin Spring Festival a China.
Mace-mace na masu cutar da aka tabbatar da ita ce 1.44% (95% CI: 1.10-1.86%), kuma mace-mace da aka sanya ido a cikin duk masu cutar ita ce 3.06% (95% CI: 2.02-4.59%).

Wannan yana nufin cewa shekaru da cututtuka na ƙarshe suna ƙarƙashin ƙarfi kuma zai iya haifar da ƙarfi ga ɗayan sauran.

A ranar 6 ga watan Fabrairu 2020, tawancinmu sun buga shawarwari mai tsawon lokaci don tabbatar da cutar da kula da cutar 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV), da wannan shawarwarin ya bayyana nasararmu da kuma zama mai amfani ga yaki da cutar a duniya.

Amma cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) ita ce cutar ta farko, yadda muna samun shawarwari da fahimta ta hanyar binciken da ake yi a yanzu da samun nasarar aiki a fannin lafiya; don haka, hanyoyin nazarin da kuma ilimin cutar kuma suna ci gaba da sabuntawa.

A cikin wannan rahoton, muka bayyana wani abu a cikin hujjar mu da kuma bayar da sabbin manufofin canji na "damu'oi" da "ruwaito" kamar yadda aka bayyana a cikin Diagnosis da Manufofin Kula da Cutar COVID-19 (hujjar 7) da aka bayar daga Kwamitin Lafiya na Ƙasa na Jamhuriyar China.

A watan Disamba 2019, 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) ya haifar da cutar, wanda a yanzu an yi imanin cewa shi ne cutar coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) da kuma cutar ya kasance an yi imanin cewa severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

Bangladesh ya yi rahoton mutane biyar da suka mutu sakamakon COVID-19, mafi girman rana
A cikin yau, Bangladesh ya tabbatar da mutuwar biyar saboda COVID-19 a ranar.
Wannan shine kwanaki mafi girma na mutuwa a cikin rana saboda cutar.

A ranar da ta gabata, Bangladesh's Institute of Epidemiology, Disease Control and Research (IEDCR) ya bayyana adadin masu cutarwa da aka kiyasta wanda ya haɗa da 114 masu cutarwa masu aiki da kuma 33 masu dawowa da ke zaune a gida.
An samu 17 mutuwa.
A taron labarai na yanar gizo, shugaban IEDCR, Dr Meerjady Sabrina Flora, ya ce mutanen da suka rasa rayuwa sun hada da mata uku da mace ɗaya.
Kamar yadda Dr Meerjady ya bayyana, biyu sun kasance a cikin shekarun 60, biyu tsakanin 51 da 60, kuma ɗaya 41-50 shekaru.
Ta ce kuma biyu daga cikin wadanda suka mutu ne daga dhaka.
Hukumar Lafiya ta Duniya (WHO) ta tabbatar da COVID-19 a matsayin cutar a ranar 11 ga Maris.

SARS-CoV-2 ya kai miliyan ɗaya na cututtukan duniya
A ranar Alhamis, adadin cutar SARS-CoV-2 da aka samu a duniya ya kai 1,000,000, bayan haka Johns Hopkins University ta bayyana.
Kimanin mutane 52,000 sun mutu ne sakamakon COVID-19, cutar da ke da alaƙa da cutar coronavirus.
Milestone ya zo a wannan ranar Malawi ya tabbatar da farkon cututtukan coronavirus da kuma Zambia ta yi farkon mutuwar coronavirus.

Bayanan ofishin bincike ya nuna cewa a ranar 20 ga watan Janairu 2020, mutane 6,174 suka samu alamun cutar. A ranar 9 ga watan Afrilu 2020, akwai kimanin mutane 1.61 miliyan da aka tabbatar da cutar a duniya; akwai kimanin mutane 97,000 da suka mutu da kuma kimanin mutane 364,000 da suka samu nasara.

A ranar 26 ga watan Maris, mutane 1.7 na duniya suna cikin hukunci, wanda ya karu zuwa mutane 2.6 na duniya biyo bayan biyan rana—kusan kashi uku na al'ummar duniya.
Lokacin da aka tabbatar da COVID-19, an tsara shi zuwa 1 Disamba 2019 a Wuhan; wani rahoton da ba a tabbatar da shi ba ya bayyana mafi girman lokaci na farko a ranar 17 Nuwamba.
Dokta Zhang Jixian ya gamsu da kungiyar cutar pneumonia da ba a sani ba a ranar 26 ga Disamba, bayan haka aikace-aikacen asibitarsa ya yi bayani ga Wuhan Jianghan CDC a ranar 27 ga Disamba.
Bincike na farko na kwayoyin halitta na marasa lafiya a ranar 27 ga Disamba, 2019 ya nuna cewa akwai coronavirus na SARS.
Bayanin jama'a an fitar da shi ne daga Hukumar Lafiya ta Gari ta Wuhan a ranar 31 Disamba.
An yi bayani ga WHO a wannan ranar.
A lokacin da wannan bayanin ya faru, likitocin Wuhan sun bayyana a matsayin masu bayyana labarai game da cutar.

A wannan ranar shugaban kasa Trump ya sanya Coronavirus Preparedness and Response Supplemental Appropriations Act, wanda ya ba da $8.3 biliyoyin kudaden shiga a matsayin kudaden shiga a cikin hukumar kasa don amsar da cutar.

China da Amurka suna da matsala da ingancin samfurori da aka yi amfani da su a farkon cutar, kuma kasashe da suka hada da Australia ba su da adadin samfurori da za su iya amfani da su don yin amfani da ingancin da masu ilimin lafiya suka yi amfani da su.

A ranar 16 ga Maris, Majalisar Dinkin Duniya ta yi kira don saukar da shirye-shiryen testa a matsayin mafi kyawun hanyar rage ci gaba na cutar COVID-19. Ci gaba da yawan testa saboda yaduwar cutar ya haifar da tsari da dama a cikin makarantun Amurka, da kuma sauran abubuwan da ke cikin sauri.
A cikin Maris 2020 China ya bayyana matsalolin da suka faru a cikinsu a cikin tsarin test.

A kasar Amurka, kit na gwada da ke cikin CDC ya sami "ciwo;" gwamnati ta dawo da iyakar siyasa da ta hana gwajin da aka shirya ta hanyar al'umma.Spain ya karɓi kit na gwada daga kamfanin Sinanci Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, amma ya samu cewa sakamakon ba su da inganci.
Kungiyar ta bayyana cewa sakamakon da ba dace ba zai iya zama nasara ne saboda rashin ajiye samfuran ko amfani da kayayyakin daidai.
Ministan kasar Spain ya ce zai cire kaya da suka bayyana sakamako daidai ba, kuma zai mayar da su da kaya da ake amfani da shi daga Shenzhen Bioeasy.
